sexAction.title: Orgasm
sexAction.tooltip: You can't do anything to prevent your orgasm!

description.text:

Throwing her head back, she lets out an ecstatic squeal and writhes around on the table as you continue to relentlessly hammer her cunt through her intense climax.

Her squeals increase in intensity as her corrupted essences are forced back inside of her, and she instinctively pushes out her chest as Angelixx roughly pinches her big, black nipples and cruelly teases, [angelixx.speech(Say goodbye to your free will, you stupid slut! It's time to start your new life as a doll!)]

As the corrupted essences reach the doll's core, the spark of life in her silicone eyes dulls, and her squeals become less passionate and more robotic-sounding. A moment later, and you're shooting a huge quantity of [pc.cum+] into her hungry pussy. Joining her lewd squeals with horny moans of your own, the two of you orgasm together while your Mistress looks on and giggles at the show you're putting on for her.

[angelixx.speech(That's enough, step back and give me some room,)] Angelixx commands as you finish pumping the doll full of your slimy cum. Instantly obeying your Mistress, you pull your softening horse-cock out of the doll and bring an end to the sex...
